title: All About Eve
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A seemingly timid but secretly manipulative ingenue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

title: Sunset Boulevard
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

title: Rashomon
description: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

title: Cinderella

director.name: Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske

description: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Born Yesterday
description: A tycoon hires a tutor to teach his lover proper etiquette, but the tutor and the lover fall in love and she learns a little too much about the tycoon's business dealings.

title: Harvey
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six-foot-three-and-a-half-inch-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane.

title: Father of the Bride
description: The father of a young woman deals with the emotional pain of her getting married, along with the financial and logistical headache of arranging the wedding.

title: The Asphalt Jungle
description: A major gem heist is planned, organized, and executed by a handful of men, but bad luck and double crosses cause the operation to fall apart.

title: In a Lonely Place
description: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon begins to have her own doubts.

title: Rio Grande
description: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is joined by his race-conscious wife and son.

title: Winchester '73
description: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden quest for vengeance.

title: The Gunfighter
description: Notorious gunfighter Jimmy Ringo rides into town to find his true love, who doesn't want to see him.

title: King Solomon's Mines
description: Adventurer Allan Quatermain guides a woman and her brother into the unknown heart of Africa to find her missing husband.

title: Annie Get Your Gun
oscars_won_details: Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture
description: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose to fame while dealing with her love/professional rival, Frank Butler.

title: D.O.A.
description: A man tries to uncover who poisoned him and why before he dies.

title: Gun Crazy
description: Two gun-obsessed lovers go on a shooting spree and become fugitives.

title: Night and the City
description: A two-bit hustler in London dreams of becoming a wrestling promoter, but his ambitions lead him down a dangerous path.

title: The Men
description: A paralyzed war veteran struggles to adjust to his new life and his relationship with his fiancée.

title: Broken Arrow
description: Tom Jeffords tries to make peace between the US government and the Apache Indians.

title: Panic in the Streets
description: A doctor and a policeman in New Orleans have only 48 hours to locate a killer infected with pneumonic plague.

title: Young Man with a Horn
description: A young trumpet player is torn between his honest career, a wealthy thrill-seeker, and a gentle singer.

title: No Way Out
description: A racist criminal tries to start a race riot in order to get revenge on the black doctor who failed to save his brother's life.

title: Stage Fright
description: A struggling actress tries to help a friend prove his innocence when he's accused of murdering the husband of a high-society entertainer.

title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
description: A police detective accidentally kills a murder suspect and tries to cover it up, but his plan goes awry.

title: Cyrano de Bergerac
description: The long-nosed poet and swordsman Cyrano helps a handsome soldier win the heart of the woman he himself loves.

title: Orpheus
description: A poet becomes obsessed with the Princess of Death in this modern retelling of the Orpheus myth.

title: Los Olvidados
description: A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City.

title: La Ronde
description: A series of interlocking romantic encounters in 1900 Vienna.

title: Wagon Master
description: Two young horse traders guide a Mormon wagon train to the San Juan Valley and encounter a gang of outlaws.

title: The Furies
description: A strong-willed daughter clashes with her tyrannical rancher father over the future of their land.

title: Caged
description: A young woman is sent to a women's prison and is hardened by the brutal environment.

title: Three Came Home
description: A woman relates her experiences in a Japanese prisoner-of-war camp in Borneo during World War II.

title: Treasure Island
description: Young Jim Hawkins finds a treasure map and sets sail with a crew of pirates, led by the treacherous Long John Silver.

title: Destination Moon
description: Four American astronauts blast off from the New Mexico desert for the moon, but technical problems jeopardize their return to Earth.

title: Champagne for Caesar
description: A genius scholar tries to bankrupt a soap company by winning a radio quiz show.

title: Stars in My Crown
description: A parson arrives in a rural town and tries to bring peace and understanding to the community.

title: Stromboli
description: To escape an internment camp, a woman marries a fisherman and moves to his island village, only to find life there unbearable.

title: The Breaking Point
description: A fishing boat captain, struggling to make ends meet, gets involved in illegal activities to save his boat and family.

title: The Flame and the Arrow
description: In medieval Italy, a peasant archer fights against a tyrannical warlord to save his family and his people.

title: Kiss Tomorrow Goodbye
description: A ruthless criminal escapes from prison and embarks on a violent crime spree while manipulating those around him.

title: Dark City
description: A gambler becomes the target of a psychopath seeking revenge for his brother's suicide after a fixed card game.

title: House by the River
description: A novelist murders his maid and tries to cover it up with the help of his reluctant brother.

title: Mystery Street
description: A Harvard pathologist helps the police identify a skeleton found on a beach and track down the killer.

title: Union Station
description: Police race against time to catch kidnappers who are holding a blind girl ransom in a busy railway station.

title: Armored Car Robbery
description: A police detective pursues a gang of criminals who pulled off a daring armored car heist.

title: Francis
description: A junior army officer gets help from a talking mule named Francis during the Burma campaign of World War II.

title: Summer Stock
description: A theater troupe takes over a woman's farm to rehearse their show, leading to romance and musical numbers.

title: The Jackpot
description: A man wins a massive radio contest jackpot, but the prizes cause chaos in his life.

title: Woman in Hiding
description: A woman flees from her murderous husband and tries to prove he killed her father.

title: The Damned Don't Cry
description: A housewife leaves her dull life and becomes a sophisticated woman involved with organized crime.
